channel.title: johnjohnston tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from johnjohnston.

item.description: Meadow Brown on Thyme, Barassie beach on Friday. A lot of butterflies in the grass between beach & golf course. https://t.co/pcxdV22ncW

item.description: @jaccymac I am sure you will. Beside tiny hill streams and boggy paths seems to be their home.
item.source:markdown: @jaccymac I am sure you will. Beside tiny hill streams and boggy paths seems to be their home.

item.description: @jaccymac My current favourite plant:-) Sundew, carnivorous, tiny and gorgeous. Quite common once you get your eye in. Nice call on the writing.
item.source:markdown: @jaccymac My current favourite plant:-) Sundew, carnivorous, tiny and gorgeous. Quite common once you get your eye in. Nice call on the writing.

item.title: tdc3841 #ds106 #myFest22 #ds106 After a very long time I found 811 paths with 5 degrees of separation from "Digital storytelling" to "Deergrass" on Six Degrees of Wikipedia! https://t.co/4nCe5D3U2u via @_jwngr

item.description:
@ds106dc #tdc3839 #ds106 #myFest22 This daily create, An invitation is waiting: So maybe later.

I could start making, I will just read the paper: History is breaking.

Watching the tweets flow, My endorphins a go-go: Maybe just doom scroll.

Not quite some haiku, In two hundred & eighty
item.source:markdown:
@ds106dc #tdc3839 #ds106 #myFest22 This daily create, An invitation is waiting: So maybe later.
I could start making, I will just read the paper: History is breaking.
Watching the tweets flow, My endorphins a go-go: Maybe just doom scroll.
Not quite some haiku, In two hundred & eighty

item.description:
Small Tortoiseshell:

Meadow Brown

Had a short walk by Jaw Reservoir, yesterday. Quite a few butterflies about. These posed. A lot of ringlets, a few whites and a red admiral did not oblige. https://t.co/4TlyPHLgrw
item.source:markdown:
Small Tortoiseshell:
Meadow Brown
Had a short walk by Jaw Reservoir, yesterday. Quite a few butterflies about. These posed. A lot of ringlets, a few whites and a red admiral did not oblige. https://t.co/4TlyPHLgrw

item.description: Yesterday I saw this wee one struggling in the grass just as drizzle stopped and the sun came out. I carefully lifted it up held it in the sunlight and it flew off. https://t.co/lhN7HJNKCT
item.source:markdown: Yesterday I saw this wee one struggling in the grass just as drizzle stopped and the sun came out. I carefully lifted it up held it in the sunlight and it flew off. https://t.co/lhN7HJNKCT
